ygData.subject: Scripts for processing crawls
ygData.msgSnippet: A couple of things: 1) Is there a reason why the Report screen was designed to only display status codes/mime type info only during a crawl and not after a job

Subject: Scripts for processing crawls

A couple of things:

1) Is there a reason why the Report screen was designed to only display 
status codes/mime type info only during a crawl and not after a job has 
been completed?  Seems like this report would be equally useful post-crawl.

2) Has anyone developed a set of R or GNUplot scripts for processing the 
ARC files of a finished job?  A set of scripts that can plot the 
distribution of MIME types, URIs, etc. would be really useful to me, and 
I'll probably write them myself unless someone already has.

3) I created a scant Heritrix entry on Wikipedia:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heritrix

If anyone has useful all-purpose tools for processing Heritrix crawls, 
this may be a great place to post a link to them.


Thanks,
Frank
